description: The muscle top and alpha male Geordie Jackson is always on the lookout for a bottom to turn into a sex servant for him, and when Benjamin and his buddy Braxton Boyd head over to Geordie’s home, that’s the scenario that plays out. title: Geordie Jackson And Braxton Boyd Slam Benjamin Gomez
